column2: fig <- fig %>% add_trace(x = ~GlobalAirpolMorta$year, y = ~GlobalAirpolMorta$`Air Pollution`, name = "Air Pollution", mode = "lines+markers", type = "scatter")
fig <- fig %>% add_trace(x = ~GlobalAirpolMorta$year, y = ~GlobalAirpolMorta$Mortality, name = "Mortality", yaxis = "y2", mode = "lines+markers", type = "scatter")
